Hi, I'm Blendi Ibraj

About Me

I'm a recent graduate from the Flatiron School Bootcamp and I have a Bachelor's Degree in Biology from Hunter College. At first, biology and programming may not seem too similar. However, a deep appreciation for both biology and web development have encouraged me to be a more thoughtful, focused, and conscientious programmer. Studying biology demanded a sharp attention to detail; problem-solving and thinking critically are essential in understanding even the simplest concepts. Front-end web development allowed me to take these skills and apply them in a more creative field.
